5332.verse: وَجَآءَ|And came|85|115|7815$فِرْعَوْنُ|Firaun,|93|154|6705$وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ|and (those) before him,|177|238|17224$وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتُ|and the overturned cities|188|218|17225$بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ|with sin.|105|105|17226$

5333.verse: فَعَصَوْاْ|And they disobeyed|151|159|17227$رَسُولَ|(the) Messenger|129|144|4615$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord,|118|134|54$فَأَخَذَهُمْ|so He seized them|141|156|13050$أَخْذَةً|(with) a seizure|124|132|17228$رَّابِيَةً|exceeding.|91|91|17229$

5335.verse: لِنَجْعَلَهَا|That We might make it|171|187|17233$لَكُمْ|for you|67|98|207$تَذْكِرَةً|a reminder|89|120|11337$وَتَعِيَهَآ|and would be conscious of it|210|242|17234$أُذُنٌ|an ear|62|78|7688$وَٲعِيَةٌ|conscious.|90|90|17235$

5337.verse: وَحُمِلَتِ|And are lifted|109|127|17237$ٱلْأَرْضُ|the earth|92|129|589$وَٱلْجِبَالُ|and the mountains|143|180|12014$فَدُكَّتَا|and crushed|101|138|17238$دَكَّةً|(with) a crushing|133|151|17239$وَٲحِدَةً|single.|78|78|1853$

5341.verse: يَوْمَئِذٍ|That Day,|86|95|3485$تُعْرَضُونَ|you will be exhibited,|159|177|17247$لَا|not|42|60|30$تَخْفَىٰ|will be hidden|109|127|17248$مِنكُمْ|among you|92|110|643$خَافِيَةٌ|any secret.|96|105|17249$

5347.verse: كُلُواْ|`Eat|61|68|539$وَٱشْرَبُواْ|and drink|103|116|578$هَنِيٓـــَٔۢا|(in) satisfaction|125|138|16191$بِمَآ|for what|76|89|43$أَسْلَفْتُمْ|you sent before you|154|167|17260$فِى|in|48|61|89$ٱلْأَيَّامِ|the days|78|85|17261$ٱلْخَالِيَةِ|past.`|85|85|17262$

5348.verse: وَأَمَّا|But as for|85|95|269$مَنْ|(him) who|86|106|76$أُوتِىَ|is given|70|90|1237$كِتَـٰبَهُۥ|his record|85|105|10466$بِشِمَالِهِۦ|in his left hand|118|138|17263$فَيَقُولُ|will say,|75|95|5331$يَـٰلَيْتَنِى|`O! I wish|87|97|4181$لَمْ|not|42|146|63$أُوتَ|I had been given|131|339|17264$كِتَـٰبِيَهْ|my record|86|190|17252$

5356.verse: إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, he|91|121|396$كَانَ لَا|(did) not|80|140|17279$يُؤْمِنُ|believe|72|132|2051$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|127|79$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|the Most Great,|125|155|996$

5332.verse: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.

5333.verse: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].

5334.verse: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship

5335.verse: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.

5336.verse: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast

5337.verse: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -

5338.verse: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,

5339.verse: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.

5340.verse: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].

5341.verse: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.

5342.verse: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!

5343.verse: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."

5344.verse: So he will be in a pleasant life -

5346.verse: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.

5347.verse: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."

5348.verse: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record

5349.verse: And had not known what is my account.

5350.verse: I wish my death had been the decisive one.

5351.verse: My wealth has not availed me.

5352.verse: Gone from me is my authority."

5353.verse: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.

5355.verse: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."

5356.verse: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,

5357.verse: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.
